title: Greece offers free holiday to tourists who fled Rhodes fires
description: (marketscreener.com) Greece said on Wednesday it will offer a week-long free stay on Rhodes in 2024 to tourists whose vacation was cut short by wildfires that burned for days on the island in July, damaging homes and hotels and forcing thousands to evacuate.h…

title: Greek PM offers free holidays to tourists as wildfire compensation
description: Government to offer 'one week of free holidays on Rhodes,' Kyriakos Mitsotakis says.
content:
Greece will grant tourists whose vacation was interrupted by the wildfires which devastated Rhodes a one-week free holiday, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said Wednesday.

title: 'We got married in Rhodes during wildfires - and spent our wedding night on a mattress'
description: Emily and Alan Martin stress the wildfires in Rhodes, Greece, "didn't ruin their big day" - even though they had to sleep on mattresses on the floor of a Greek school
content:
A British couple who got married in Rhodes during the wildfires last week had to sleep on mattresses on the floor the night before their big day.

title: Greece offers free holidays to wildfire affected tourists to return to Rhodes
description: The Greek government is hoping make amends for affected tourists with return trips.
